The examples are the fastest way to get started with GemBox.Presentation.

To see the live examples and demos, go to Example Explorer: https://www.gemboxsoftware.com/presentation/examples

To download the examples C# and VB.NET projects, go to GitHub: https://github.com/GemBoxLtd/GemBox.Presentation.Examples

You need to call the ğš‚ğšğšğ™»ğš’ğšŒğšğš—ğšœğš method before using any other member from GemBox.Presentation.

For the ğ—™ğ—¥ğ—˜ğ—˜ version, use the "FREE-LIMITED-KEY" as following:

    ComponentInfo.SetLicense("FREE-LIMITED-KEY")

For the ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—™ğ—˜ğ—¦ğ—¦ğ—œğ—¢ğ—¡ğ—”ğ—Ÿ version, replace "FREE-LIMITED-KEY" with your license key.
You can purchase the license from our webshop: https://www.gemboxsoftware.com/presentation/pricelist
